Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay so I need to model this hospital patient management process as a process tree Let me start by understanding the steps provided The process starts with the patient arriving A then registration RG and intake assessment IA Then triage with TI and TC followed by the initial diagnostic test which can be either CE or FBP

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: After the initial test if abnormal theres a loop involving SC then a treatment TM or SPT then RDT which can loop again if results are abnormal Once normal AI and NC in parallel then FAS DDI and finally BL ICP MRF in another parallel step The loop step uses the operator

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: First the initial steps Arrive RG IA These seem sequential So arrange them with operator Then TI followed by TC in sequence Then the exclusive choice between CE or FBP Thats an X operator wrapping CE and FBP

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: After the initial test if abnormal theres a loop The loop starts with SC A then either TM or SPT Then RDT The loop structure here is A SC then B TM or SPT Then RDT is part of the loop

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: the loop repeats after the RDT if abnormal the patient returns to SC and subsequent treatments So maybe the loop is structured as SC A leading to B TM or SPT then RDT If RDT is abnormal then loop back to SC A again

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait the operator description says the loop repeats A then either B or exit So in this case the loop should be A is SC and B is TM or SPT Then RDT is part of the loop Maybe the loop is SC then X TM SPT then RDT Then if RDT is abnormal loop again

Name: Validation - NE
Text: This is getting too tangled Maybe theres a misunderstanding here the operator loop is defined as execute A then either you exit the loop or you execute B and then A again So the loop body is A then after A you can choose to execute B and then A again But that doesnt match the process

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Given the time constraints Ill proceed with the following approach The loop is represented as A B where A is the Specialist Consultation SC and B is the EXCLCHOICE between TM and SPT Then after each iteration RDT is checked and if abnormal loop
